column5: WTG Ben, some real good lookin fish there !!
Damn I soooooo hate you....
Those are some serious eyes lads!!...congrats!!

... you missed a pretty good day.  Simon (limeyangler) was supposed to join us today for a day of walleye fishing on Lac Seul.   However, freezing rain in the forecast kept Simon down in Dryden but Graham and I still hit the lake.  We picked up some for the freezer and a few nice fish that went back down the hole.  Lost a slush scoop and broke a rod too.  Quite a day.  Graham with a couple of nice fish.  24"       Mid day, my set line started to go slowly down and I set the hook into something solid.  My PB Ice walleye 27"      Sorry you couldn't make it today Simon.  We'll have to make it up on the 17th.  The big girls are still down there waiting for you.  Tight lines all,  Ben
Spoiled rotten.........I'm jealous  Congrats on the PB!  Sinker
Nice..... I've been dreaming of getting back up there for another week!
Nice fish bud! Not surprising either, I've always found the full moon in Feb to be a pretty good bite. (One more day and hopefully I can finally get a few of my own when I head north  )
WOW.... That is a serious beast     congratulations Ben Sorry to hear about the mishap.... gotta hate it when that happens  Super job you guys and thanks for sharing Jacques

AAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!   LOLOL...i knew it......well done lads...awesome job!   I could hardly bare to look....but just had too.   Congrats on the PB Ben!  I'm kinda glad that i stayed here though...cuz it was freezing rain all day and that Sioux Lookout highway would have been evil...specially at 5am as it was raining real early here.   17th for sure amigo!....keep 'em hungry for me will ya  \ PS...i bought a williams bay map...so i'll have to rember to get you to mark a few hotspots on there for me.   Great job as usual guys...   as you once said Ben   Northwest....REPRESENT!......lol  your such a gangsta
EXCELLENT!!!  Thank you for sharing your report! Beauty walleyes for sure!
Hey Roy.. you got a bus licence... Maybe pick us all up along the way to Ben Land !   Another great adventure Ben! What a hog !
great report and good job on the PB  all them are tasty and healthy lookin fish, and as for Simon, i seem to think he gets out enough anyhow judging by the posts up every couple a days

That's it.  Next time I'm back at my parents I'm making sure to call you NorthWesterners and getting more than hour outta T Bay.  Beautiful fish and great pics of them Ben.  Simon I can feel your pain from here - I'm pretty sure we've all had those days when you decide not to go and the other guy knocks it out of the park.
Lol...i did get out today....in front of the house.......2 walleye....one the size of the tail on the one ben is holding....the other even smaller
great report congrats on the pb!  cheers!
Healthy looking eyes if I say so myself....
Ya just don't stop do ya???? It's so fun pullin those pigs through the ice only to see them swim away!!!!  Once again, well done.
hahahah imagine that! i'm in the same boat, but latched into about 30 perch instead of two little eyes!
nice job and congrats on the PB she is a beauty  Rick
Thanks everyone  17th for sure Simon.  Don't forget that Lac Seul map and I'll have you catching walleye all summer too.
awesome report.....gorgeous fish! congrats on the PB way to go!
Awesome looking walters
Nice Wally's....
GOLDEN NUGETS!!!  you hit the gols mine there BOYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYZ  awesome job on the PERS. BEST!  keep these reports COMMIN!
Brilliant Job Ben! Very impressed and Jealous at the same time.  Its a crappy feeling.  Great Report!
Congrats on the through the ice pb!!  Just gorgeous!     Look forward to seeing the report for the 17th.....
Nice!!!!
wow those are beauties !!!!
